affix.description: Whether the anchor is displayed like an Affix, and if set to 'true', it will also accept Props from [Affix](affix#affix-props).
affix.description_zh: Anchor 是否像 Affix 一样展示，如果设定为 `true`，它还会接受 [Affix](affix#Affix-Props) 的 Props

:bound.description: element starts triggering the anchor's offset
:bound.description_zh: 元素开始触发 anchor 的偏移量

ignore-gap.description: If set to true, the navigation will be displayed in the exact href area
ignore-gap.description_zh: 如果设定为 true, 导航将显示在准确的 href 区域

offset-target.description: Calculates elements or selectors whose offset positions are relative. If you're scrolling not through the entire document but just a portion of it, you may want to set this up
offset-target.description_zh: 计算偏移位置相对的元素或选择器。如果你滚动的不是整个文档而只是其中的一部分，那你有可能要设定这个

show-rail.description: Whether or not to show the tracks on the side

show-background.description: Whether or not to display the background of the link
show-background.description_zh: 是否展示 link 的背景

type.description: Anchor style, block is block style, rail is track style
type.description_zh: Anchor 的风格，block 为块状风格，rail 为轨道风格

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Manually trigger to the specified scroll position
methods.description_zh: 手动触发到指定滚动位置
